item.title: Lobsters Top Stories: Saturday, February 8, 2025 at 4:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Gleam v1.8.0 released (55 points | 6 comments)
2. CPython tail-call interpreter merged for Python 3.14, a 10% speedup in benchmarks (34 points | 14 comments)
3. getaddrinfo sucks. everything else is much worse (14 points | 6 comments)
4. You Didn't Notice MP3 Is Now Free (46 points | 34 comments)
5. Comments on Shared Unix Hosting vs. the Cloud (28 points | 45 comments)
6. Refined: simple refinement types for Rust (10 points | 5 comments)
7. AI haters build tarpits to trap and trick AI scrapers that ignore robots.txt (5 points | 4 comments)
8. Cloudflare incident on February 6, 2025 (14 points | 1 comment)
9. Fun Friday: what's the weirdest automation you've ever made? (7 points | 18 comments)
10. What are you doing this weekend? (10 points | 21 comments)
11. Asdf Version Manager Has Been Re-Written in Golang (59 points | 38 comments)
12. numbat: A statically typed programming language for scientific computations with first class support for physical dimensions and units (17 points | 4 comments)
13. A Brief History of Code Signing at Mozilla (8 points | no comments)
14. FOSDEM 2025 - 14 Years of systemd (16 points | 3 comments)
15. polysubml-demo: A simple ML-like language with subtyping, polymorphism, higher rank types, and global type inference (6 points | no comments)
16. HTML Whitespace is Broken (51 points | 41 comments)
17. The Three Projections of Doctor Futamura (18 points | 5 comments)
18. Docker Bake is Now Generally Available (1 points | 1 comment)
19. The LLM Curve of Impact on Software Engineers (6 points | 7 comments)
20. It Is Time to Standardize Principles and Practices for Software Memory Safety (43 points | 22 comments)
21. CODE beyond FAIR (2 points | no comments)
22. DOOM running on Apple Lightning to HDMI dongle (20 points | 7 comments)
23. OpenWrt 24.10.0 - First Stable Release (14 points | 5 comments)
24. Updating a large codebase to Rust 2024 (18 points | 2 comments)
25. A Decade of TILs (7 points | 3 comments)
item.guid: Lobsters Top Stories: Saturday, February 8, 2025 at 4:15 AM UTC
